directions: Toss apple chunks in a bowl with 2 teaspoons tangerine juice. Whisk remaining tangerine juice, sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, and salt in a bowl until sugar and salt have dissolved. Pour dressing over apple and toss.
ingredients: 1 apple, cored and cut into chunks
1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
title: Crisp Apples with Citrus Dressing
